mapper.select: select H.house_id, H.member_id, H.house_type, H.house_type_detail, H.house_person, H.house_room, H.house_bed, H.house_bath, H.house_location, H.house_comfort_facility, H.house_secure_facility, H.house_use_facility, H.house_title, H.house_charge, nvl(avg(R.review_score),0) as review_score, count(R.review_id) as review_count from (select * from threeb_house where member_id=#{member_id}) H left outer join threeb_review R on (H.house_id=R.house_id) group by H.house_id, H.member_id, H.house_type, H.house_type_detail, H.house_person, H.house_room, H.house_bed, H.house_bath, H.house_location, H.house_comfort_facility, H.house_secure_facility, H.house_use_facility, H.house_title, H.house_charge order by house_id
